algorithms



CompType

type: C enum
description: comparison type
COMP_FIRST select first element when comparing
COMP_SECOND select second element when comparing
COMP_EQUAL elements are equal
COMP_COUNT

order_func

typedef bool(*order_func)(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C typedef
description: function pointer for order: a > b or a < b

c_superior_bool_func

bool c_superior_bool_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: bool a > bool b

c_superior_i8_func

bool c_superior_i8_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: int8 a > int8 b

c_superior_ui8_func

bool c_superior_ui8_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: uint8 a > uint8 b

c_superior_i16_func

bool c_superior_i16_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: int16 a > int16 b

c_superior_ui16_func

bool c_superior_ui16_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: uint16 a > uint16 b

bool c_superior_i32_func(const void *a, const void *b);

description: int32 a > int32 b

c_superior_string_func

c_superior_pointer_func

bool c_superior_pointer_func(const void *a, const void *b);

c_compare

CompType c_compare(const void *a, const void *b, order_func function);
type: C function
description: compare a & b using function

c_array_reverse

void c_array_reverse(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *swap);
type: C function
description: reverse an array

c_array_is_sorted

bool c_array_is_sorted(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, order_func function);
type: C function
description: return true if array is sorted based on function

c_array_sort

void c_array_sort(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *swap, order_func function);
type: C function
description: sort array using function

c_array_find

int32 c_array_find(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *data);
type: C function
description: find index of data in array, returns C_INVALID_INDEX if not found

c_array_sorted_find

int32 c_array_sorted_find(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *data, order_func function);
type: C function
description: find index of data in sorted array, returns C_INVALID_INDEX if not found

c_array_sorted_insert_index

bool  c_array_sorted_insert_index(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *data, order_func function, int32 *out_index);
type: C function
description: find index to insert data in sorted array, returns true if index can be added, false if index already in data
